column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Went to this place on a Friday nights at 7:30 and the wait was 1 hour. First time trying it so might as well wait. The restaurant is really small
column2: kind of given since it is located in downtown. But the ramen definitely worth the wait
column4: I can see why the locals think this is the best ramen restaurant in town. Definitely will try their other location in town
